days.text: Mainly fine. Mist and haze. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, becoming force 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
